pages.title: Chrono-Harness
pages.text: The <item>Chrono-Harness/$ is a way of producing Forge Energy that produce <thing>$(l:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy/$ as a byproduct.$(br2)It has no maximum FE power output, but produces 1 <thing>$(l:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy/$ for every 50FE produced (by default). As a result, producing more than 800FE/tick will create
<thing>$(l:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy/$ faster than it can be drained by <thing>$(l:technomancy/node)entropy nodes/$, causing it to inevitably explode.
